JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities Integration of user-facing element developed by front-end developers with server-side logic.Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code.Architect technical solutions and write high quality JavaScript to create an exceptional user experience.Desired Candidate Profile Implementation of security and data protection.Integration of data storage solution (may include database, key-value stores, blob stores, etc.)Troubleshoot and fix front-end issues.Perks and Benefits Salary for right candidate is not a constraint.

EDUCATION.UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, Graduation Not Required
